section.title: Structure
section.para:
There are several key items in the structure of the Model:
JTalks Common - since JTalks is a multi-component project with components having in a lot of cases the same entities and validation rules, a lot of our entities are placed in a separate project and are exposed as already ready-to use JAR files in our Maven Repo. We use those JARs to create a schema in our database (jtalks-common-model contains migration scripts), to map the entities per se to the database (the Hibernate mapping for all the entities is inside Poulpe), to use some commonly used classes e.g. for Security.
If we want to add something to common modules, we need to raise a ticket in JIRA for JTalks Common project and it will be resolved by common team and exposed as next version of common artifacts.
